Title: WEIGHT_STRING()
Examples:
SET NAMES 'utf8mb4';
SELECT HEX(WEIGHT_STRING('ab' AS CHAR(3))) AS char_result, HEX(WEIGHT_STRING('ab' AS BINARY(3))) AS binary_result;
EffectiveSQLsRefined: SELECT HEX(WEIGHT_STRING('ab' AS CHAR(3))) AS char_result, HEX(WEIGHT_STRING('ab' AS BINARY(3))) AS binary_result;
EffectiveSQLs: SELECT HEX(WEIGHT_STRING('ab' AS CHAR(3))) AS char_result, HEX(WEIGHT_STRING('ab' AS BINARY(3))) AS binary_result;
